name: Oliver Snowe
story: Oliver Snowe grew up in a small village in Africa. He joined the military at a young age, seeking a way to provide for his family. Oliver quickly proved to be an exceptional marksman and was selected for special training. He is well-respected by his peers and superiors alike for his dedication to duty and unwavering determination. However, he struggles to balance his commitment to the mission with his longing to return home to his wife and children.
